plot: A heart rendering and subtly humorous saga based on the devastating 2004 tragedy which claimed millions. The point that is driven home is, "disaster's create destruction but sometimes binds too".
title: Tsunami 81
plot_es: A heart rendering and subtly humorous saga based on the devastating 2004 tragedy which claimed millions. The point that is driven home is, "disaster's create destruction but sometimes binds too".
